game_description: Prepare yourself and gear up by handpicking and assembling an arsenal of weapons from various rifle components that can be unlocked and combined after finishing levels. Fight back and defend your Draconite against the Kayoo, an ancient horde of golems you awoke and whose sole goal is to find and destroy the crystals. Find and raise your pet dragons to help your progress across the different levels and worlds in your adventure.
